snippet: The United States exported 268,000 barrels of crude oil a day in April, the highest in 15 years, with almost all of it delivered to Canada, the Energy Information Administration said.
abstract: Energy Information Administration says that United States exported 268,000 barrels of crude oil a day in April, highest in 15 years, with almost all of it delivered to Canada.
lead_paragraph: The United States exported 268,000 barrels of crude oil a day in April, the highest in 15 years, with almost all of it delivered to Canada, the Energy Information Administration said.

headline.main: U.S. Crude Oil Exports Hit a 15-Year Monthly High
headline.print_headline: U.S. Crude Oil Exports Hit a 15-Year Monthly High
